docs.lead_paragraph: A MOTHER, ill and deserted, trying to keep her family together . . . an abandoned child . . . an old couple facing the threat of separation because of illness . . . a bewildered youth who has never had a real home.

headline.main: REMEMBER THESE: THE NEEDIEST OF ALL!

docs.snippet: A MOTHER, ill and deserted, trying to keep her family together . . . an abandoned child . . . an old couple facing the threat of separation because of illness . . . a bewildered youth who has never had a real home.
